import re

def extract_identity(text):
    pattern = '([A-Za-z]+(?: [A-Za-z-]+){1,3})'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    return matches[1] if matches else None

mutants.original_line: return matches[0] if matches else None
mutants.mutated_line: return matches[-1] if matches else None

mutants.code:
import re

def extract_identity(text):
    pattern = '([A-Za-z]+(?: [A-Za-z-]+){1,3})'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, text)
    return matches[1] if matches else None
